awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.for: TV Program of the Year
awardEventDetails.description: (THE NIGHT OF shines a stark light on a complex case against a young Muslim man charged with murder - proving that truth may be incidental in the darkness of a system that consumes and corrupts. The revelations of Richard Price and Steven Zaillian's provocative series are illuminated by the wrenching, realistic performances from Riz Ahmed and John Turturro - and, ultimately cast a harsh shadow upon racial prejudice, institutional perversion and criminal injustice.)

awardsHtml:
13 wins & 42 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2017 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Lead Actor in a Limited Series or Movie
Riz Ahmed (For playing: "Nasir 'Naz' Khan".)
2017 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Lead Actor in a Limited Series or Movie
John Turturro (For playing: "John Stone".)
2017 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited Series or Movie
Bill Camp (For playing: "Dennis Box".)
2017 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited Series or Movie
Michael Kenneth Williams (For playing: "Freddy Knight".)
2017 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Directing for a Limited Series, Movie or a Dramatic Special
James Marsh (For The Art of War (2016))

AFI Awards, USA

2017 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(THE NIGHT OF shines a stark light on a complex case against a young Muslim man charged with murder - proving that truth may be incidental in the darkness of a system that consumes and corrupts. The revelations of Richard Price and Steven Zaillian's provocative series are illuminated by the wrenching, realistic performances from Riz Ahmed and John Turturro - and, ultimately cast a harsh shadow upon racial prejudice, institutional perversion and criminal injustice.)
